title: Lui kawr thuk thim leh zan thim tak ata chu
lyrics:
Lui kawr thuk thim leh zan thim tak ata chu,
Sual thuk tak ata, ka thlarau, lo kir la;
Chatuan nunna eng lam hi lo hawi langin,
"Ka theihnghilh lo vang che," Lal Isuan a ti.

"Ka theihnghilh lo'ng che i dam chhungin,
Kutin ka chelh tlat che, ka thupek hi ringhlek suh;
Ka theihnghilh lo'ng che dam chhungin,
I Tlantu ka ni, ka veng zel ang," a ti.

Khawvel thimna leh chhumten min khuh laiin,
A hmangaihna leh ngilneih ka ringhlel thin;
Tunah Kalvaria a hmangaih ka hriatin,
Amah lo chu himna reng a awm lo ve.

Beisei em emin Lalpa, ka lo kal e,
Fak leh lawm hla sain i hnen lam ka pan;
Lei thian ata van Lal fa ni zawk turin,
Isu, min ko fo la, i van inah khian.

Van hmun ropui rangkachak khi thlir zelin,
Mangang leh hlau leh buai leh khur chung pawhin;
Malsawmna hlu leh hahchawlhna i hmu ang,
I chatuan hmun van
khi en reng zel mai rawh.
